data.actual_result: Audit Log entry states that prune was performed "For a day of inactivity"
data.expected_result: Audit Log entry states that action was performed with the "30 days of inactivity" option
data.short_description: Audit log displays wrong info about pruning members action
data.steps_to_repro: - Open server settings, Members, click "Prune" - Choose the "more than 30 days ago" option, confirm "Prune" - Open server settings, Audit Log, expand recent prune action entry
